name: Dorothy M. HARTMAN, petitioner, v. BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, et al.
name_abbreviation: Hartman v. Bank of N.Y. Mellon

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
Dorothy M. HARTMAN, petitioner,
v.
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, et al.

opinions.text: Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperisdenied. Petitioner allowed until October 27, 2014, within which to pay the docketing fee required by Rule 38(a) and to submit a petition in compliance with Rule 33.1 of the Rules of this Court.

casebody.head_matter:
Dorothy M. HARTMAN, petitioner,
v.
BANK OF NEW YORK MELLON, et al.
No. 13-10187.
Supreme Court of the United States
Oct. 6, 2014.
Opinion
